content:
Check:
  all:
    - name:
      operator:
    - name: TATRANS
      operator: empty
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0252
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Trigger error when trial Design allows for a Subject to transition to
  an Element other than the next Element in sequence, and TATRANS is null
Outcome:
  Message: TATRANS is null when trial Design allows for a Subject to transition to
    an Element other than the next Element in sequence
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0252
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: If the trial design allows a subject to transition
                  to an Element other than the next Element in sequence, then the
                  conditions for transitioning to those other Elements, and the alternative
                  Element sequences, are specified in this rule (e.g., Responders
                  go to washout).
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Specification
                Section: 7.2.1
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - TRIAL DESIGN
  Domains:
    Include:
      - TA

json.Description: Trigger error when trial Design allows for a Subject to transition to an Element other than the next Element in sequence, and TATRANS is null

Outcome.Message: TATRANS is null when trial Design allows for a Subject to transition to an Element other than the next Element in sequence

Citations.Cited_Guidance: If the trial design allows a subject to transition to an Element other than the next Element in sequence, then the conditions for transitioning to those other Elements, and the alternative Element sequences, are specified in this rule (e.g., Responders go to washout).
